title: Bug 9619: Move static member: Dialog details
description: Bug 9619: Move static member: Dialog details 20020212a. Mnemonics b. No validation on the type field. The existence of the type is not too expensive (done in the type wizard for the superclass), so it could be done. At least isValidTypeName f. The label could say 'Select destination type:' g.
OB: When opening the dialog, the browse button appears too small. The title is used for long text. When going to the next page, it displays 'Type not found'. All types from the source folders of the own project are shown in the dialog. e. The destination type can be the source type: refactoring warns that this will result in errors (which is not true) and makes pseudo changes in all referencing classes.
EB: I would use the title for 'Move static field(s)' and use the description for 'x fields from xx' d. The selection dialog should be initialized with the type currently entered. h.
